name: ext_R4B_ClaimResponse_ad_de_subDetail
title: Cross-version Extension for R4B.ClaimResponse.addItem.detail.subDetail for use in FHIR R2
description: This cross-version extension represents ClaimResponse.addItem.detail.subDetail from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ClaimResponse|4.3.0 for use in FHIR R2.

element.definition: The third-tier service adjudications for payor added services.
unique id for the element within a resource (for internal references).

May be used to represent additional information that is not part of the basic definition of the element. element.short: Billing, service, product, or drug code
element.definition: When the value is a group code then this item collects a set of related claim details, otherwise this contains the product, service, drug or other billing code for the item.

element.definition: The number of repetitions of a service or product.
element.comment: The context of use may frequently define what kind of quantity this is and therefore what kind of units can be used. The context of use may also restrict the values for the comparator.

constraint.human: If a code for the unit is present, the system SHALL also be present
The comparator is not used on a SimpleQuantity

mapping.map: PQ, IVL<PQ>, MO, CO, depending on the values

element.short: Fee, charge or cost per item
element.definition: If the item is not a group then this is the fee for the product or service, otherwise this is the total of the fees for the details of the group.
